title: Marathon Kids National Kickoff Ceremony
text:
Marathon Kids National Kickoff Ceremony Where 
10:00 a.m. Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015 Categories 
Events, Sports Cancel any plans you’ve already made and mark your calendars, because you’re not going to want to miss our 20th anniversary National Kickoff Ceremony! You may think you know Marathon Kids and our annual Kickoff Ceremony, but you don’t know the new Nike fueled Marathon Kids. With our recently announced national partnership, you haven’t experienced anything like what’s in store on October 17th when Nike comes to town. Plan to arrive at 9:30AM to secure a good seat. Show starts at 10:00AM! You’ll want to see the surprises we have planned. Related
